items.sentence: Tom just wanted Mary to help him a little more with the children.
Tom knew that Mary was likely to not be interested in doing that.
Tom let the ashes from his cigarette fall on my expensive carpet.
I\'m afraid I won\'t be able to make myself understood in French.
I\'m getting sleepy. I should\'ve gone to bed earlier last night.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom didn\'t know Mary was going to do that.
I think we should ask Tom how much sugar we need to make cookies.
I wish everybody would stop telling me I need to be more careful.
The doctor who did the surgery is now talking with Tom\'s family.
Tom accidentally walked into a room full of people wearing suits.
